name: RTS/RPG: Miracle of Sol
description:
Command Holy Soldiers, vanquish the Dark Necromancer and return the Light of Sol in this RTS/RPG Hybrid! Miracle of Sol combines the interactivity and gameplay of a micro RTS with RPG style progression and narrative.

The Dark Necromancer has returned, and only the Champion of Sol may vanquish this abhorrent evil! Take control of the party of Heroes and bring the fight to Hell itself to finally end the greatest threat humanity has faced. Lay waste to your foes from afar, using ranged weaponry and powerful abilities, or charge forward with the enraged Warpriest and engage the foe in a vicious melee.

Hear the lore of Sol's grace and the blasphemy of Hell in this fully voice acted campaign. Witness the story unfold through three unique missions and five dynamic cutscenes. Be enlightened to the thoughts and concerns of each party member as they level up and improve.

This demo was made as part of my final year games design course. Original scope was 5 levels but unfortunately only 3 had been completed with some left over jank. Development is currently halted, however, if people enjoy the game I will like to spend time further developing it.
